title: Which college should I prefer for CSE, GRIET or BVRIT? - Quora
tags: Padmasri Dr. B.V. Raju Institute of Technology
Gokaraju Rangaraju Institute of Engineering and Technology

response.answer_text: Griet is school. It has many restrictions within college. They treat you as narayana chaitanya. BVRIT is good. Many opportunities and a very encouraging environment. I recommend visiting both colleges and then decide as per your comfort level.
